statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT user_id, data_usage FROM traffic_patterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE data_usage > 100;
SELECT AVG(data_usage) FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, data_usage FROM traffic_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' AND data_usage > 100 ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_usage FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_usage > 500 ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, ROUND(data_usage, 2) AS rounded_usage FROM traffic_patterns WHERE data_usage < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT id, user_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) AS year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month, ROUND(data_usage, 2) AS usage_by_month FROM traffic_patterns WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY year, month ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) AS avg_traffic FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT id, resource_type, allocated_capacity FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date FROM traffic_patterns WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_volume FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY date ORDER BY date;
SELECT id, resource_type, allocated_capacity FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_capacity > 500 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, JSON_EXTRACT(usage_data, '$.status') AS status FROM resource_allocation WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(usage_data, '{
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM traffic_patterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT allocated_bandwidth, used_bandwidth FROM network_resource_allocation WHERE time_period >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY used_bandwidth DESC;
SELECT id, infrastructure_name, capacity FROM capacity_planning WHERE utilization > 0.8;
SELECT id, timestamp, destination_ip, source_ip FROM traffic_patterns WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM traffic_patterns WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_resource_allocation WHERE used_bandwidth > 100 AND allocated_bandwidth < 500;
SELECT infrastructure_name, capacity, utilization FROM capacity_planning WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY utilization DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM traffic_patterns WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT destination_ip, data_usage FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth >= 500;
SELECT network_device_id, predicted_traffic FROM capacity_planning WHERE predicted_traffic < 50000;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_usage FROM traffic_patterns WHERE data_usage > 1000 ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT network_device_id, allocated_bandwidth FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT network_device_id, predicted_traffic FROM capacity_planning WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-28' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, SUM(data_sent) AS total_data_sent, SUM(data_received) AS total_data_received FROM usage_data GROUP BY source_ip;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, data_usage FROM traffic_patterns WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.1' AND data_usage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, bandwidth_used FROM Traffic_Patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, allocated_bandwidth FROM Resource_Allocation ORDER BY allocated_bandwidth ASC;
SELECT * FROM Capacity_Planning WHERE capacity_needed > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM Usage_Data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, SUM(bandwidth_used) AS total_bandwidth_used FROM Traffic_Patterns GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM Resource_Allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth > 1000 AND usage_status = 'active'
SELECT user_id, data_usage FROM Usage_Data WHERE network_type = 'LTE' ORDER BY data_usage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, capacity_needed FROM Capacity_Planning WHERE network_type = 'Fiber'
